Republic of the Philippines CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY Tanza Campus Ph. 2, Bahay Katuparan, Bagtas, Tanza, Cavite (046) 414 – 3979 www.cvsu.edu.ph
CASCADING OF NATIONAL AND REGIONAL GOALS TO THE INSTITUTIONAL LEVEL
National Goals To create a globally competitive knowledge economy, citizens must be provided with access to lifelong learning opportunities. The following strategies will be implemented to ensure lifelong opportunities for all:
To improve the quality of higher education and research for quality and global competitiveness: • Expand access to higher education. st • Integrate 21 Century competencies. • Promote creative arts. • Strengthen Quality Assurance Mechanism. • Improve research, innovation and extension activities. • Expand Government-Academe-Industry collaboration. • Promote excellence among higher education institutions. • Allow and attract reputed foreign professors and researchers, especially in the Science, Technology, and Innovation field, to be appointed in higher education institutions. (Source: Philippine Development Plan, 2017-2022)
Regional Goals CALABARZON will ensure lifelong opportunities for all through: • Achieving quality, accessible, relevant, and liberating basic education for all; • Improving the quality of higher education and research for equity and global competitiveness. (Source: CALABARZON Regional Development Plan, 2017-2022)
University Goals Provide excellent quality, equitable and relevant educational opportunities – through quality instructions. (Source: CvSU Vission-Mission)
Campus Goals • Provide high-quality instruction in order to produce skilled, morally upright, and globally competitive graduates; • Develop and pursue advanced research activities through arts, sciences, and technology to support instruction; and • Develop and conduct extension activities that will empower people and communities.

Republic of the Philippines CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY Tanza Campus Ph. 2, Bahay Katuparan, Bagtas, Tanza, Cavite (046) 414 – 3979 www.cvsu.edu.ph

Conduct relevant trainings and developmental extension activities among various stakeholders. Tanza Campus Goals The department shall • Provide high-quality instruction in order to endeavor to: produce skilled, morally upright and globally • provide high quality competitive graduates; instruction and • Develop and pursue advance research activities professional through arts, sciences and technology to support expertise to students, instruction; and to prepare them in the • Develop and conduct extension activities that will different empower people and communities. organizational settings as upright

and competitive individuals; • equip students with the knowledge and principles of marketing management, tourism and hospitality management and its application in their future career; • develop global awareness among students to meet the dynamic requirements of marketing management, tourism and hospitality industry thru research works, and community development programs by creating strong linkages with related organizations; and • deliver a gender-fair and gender sensitive instructions to students aligned with the university goals and objectives.
